api.body:
require "pixcHelper"
self.pixcHelper = createPixcHelper(pixc, self())
local tl = self.Internal.getFirstReffedTimeline()
if tl == nil then
	tl = pixc.getRoot().Pixera.Timelines.getTimelineAtIndex(0)
	if tl == nil then
		return
	end
end

local layer = Pixera.Timelines.Layer.getInst(tl.getName() .. "." .. self.pixcHelper:getProperty("Layer Name", "Layer 1"))
if layer == nil or layer.getHandleInt() == 0 then
	return
end
self.Internal.fillLayer(tl, layer, self.Internal.getResources())
api.name: buildTimeline
toTimeline
toFolderResource

api.body:
--attKind:standard
self.fadeTime = pixcCommon.execAttribute(0, self.fadeTime, Value, doSet, true )
api.name: FadeDuration

elems.body:
local res = self.toTimeline()
for _, v in ipairs(res) do
	for __, k in ipairs(v) do
		if k ~= nil then
			return k
		end
	end
end
elems.name: getFirstReffedTimeline

elems.body:
if true then
	local crRes = self.toFolderResource("getResources")
	for _, v in ipairs(crRes) do
		for __, k in ipairs(v) do
			if k ~= nil then
				return k
			end
		end
	end
end
if true then return end
local folder = pixc.getRoot().Pixera.Resources.getResourceFolderWithNamePath("Media/Standard Content")
if folder == nil then
	return {}
end
local resources = folder.getResources()
if resources == nil then
	return {}
end
return resources
elems.name: getResources

elems.body:
if timeline == nil or layer == nil or resources == nil then
	pixc.log("nil parameters")
	return
end
pixc.log("timeline " .. timeline.getName())
pixc.log("will fill layer: " .. layer.getName())
local fps = timeline.getFps()
timeline.removeCues()
layer.removeClips()
local time = 0
local endTime = 0
for _, res in ipairs(resources) do
	local duration = res.getDuration()
	if duration > 0 then
		if duration < 2 then
			duration = 10
		end
		local clip = layer.createClip()
		local playCue = self.pixcHelper:getProperty("CreatePlayCue")
		if clip ~= nil and playCue == "true" then
			clip.setDuration(duration * fps)
			clip.setTime(time * fps)
			clip.assignResource(res.getId())
			timeline.createCue(" "..string.sub(res.getName(), 0, -5), time * fps, 1)
			endTime = time + duration
			time = endTime
			elseif clip ~= nil and playCue == "false" then
			clip.setDuration(duration * fps)
			clip.setTime(time * fps)
			clip.assignResource(res.getId())
			endTime = time + duration
			time = endTime
		end
		if self.fadeTime == nil then
			local fadeTime = 0
			else
			fadetime = self.fadeTime
			if duration > 2 then
				time = time - self.fadeTime
			end
		end
	end
end
if endTime > 1 then
	local cue = timeline.createCue("ToBeginning", endTime * fps - 1, 4)
	if cue ~= nil then
		cue.setJumpGoalTime(0)
	end
end
self.timelineBuilt()
elems.name: fillLayer
